mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mysystem.course ( coach_id, name, description, duration_minutes, difficulty, category, tags, cover_url, max_enrollment, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{coachId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{durationMinutes}, #{difficulty}, #{category}, #{tags}, #{coverUrl}, #{maxEnrollment}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.select:
SELECT c.id, c.coach_id, c.name, c.description, c.duration_minutes, c.difficulty, c.category, c.tags, c.cover_url, c.max_enrollment, c.create_time, c.update_time, COUNT(e.id) AS enrolled_count FROM mysystem.course c LEFT JOIN mysystem.course_enrollment e ON c.id = e.course_id AND e.status = '报名中' WHERE c.coach_id = #{coachId}
AND c.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND c.tags LIKE CONCAT('%', #{tag}, '%')
GROUP BY c.id, c.coach_id, c.name, c.description, c.duration_minutes, c.difficulty, c.category, c.tags, c.cover_url, c.max_enrollment, c.create_time, c.update_time ORDER BY c.create_time DESC
